Columns.Description: Time (UTC) when the log was generated.
Columns.Name: TimeGenerated

Columns.Description: CorrelationId.
Columns.Name: CorrelationId

Columns.Description: Operation associated with the log record.
Columns.Name: OperationName

Columns.Description: Tenant ID associated with the Purview account.
Columns.Name: PurviewTenantId

Columns.Description: Subscription ID associated with the Purview account.
Columns.Name: PurviewSubscriptionId

Columns.Description: Name of the Purview account.
Columns.Name: PurviewAccountName

Columns.Description: Region of the Purview account.
Columns.Name: PurviewRegion

Columns.Description: Name of the data source scanned.
Columns.Name: SourceName

Columns.Description: Type of data source scanned.
Columns.Name: SourceType

Columns.Description: Resource Path of the data source. Ex: ARM path for Azure resources and ARN for AWS resources
Columns.Name: SourcePath

Columns.Description: Subscription ID associated with the data source.
Columns.Name: SourceSubscriptionId

Columns.Description: The location of the data source.
Columns.Name: SourceRegion

Columns.Description: Name of the data source collection name in Purview.
Columns.Name: SourceCollectionName

Columns.Description: Owner of the data source.
Columns.Name: SourceOwner

Columns.Description: Name of the asset scanned.
Columns.Name: AssetName

Columns.Description: Path of the asset scanned.
Columns.Name: AssetPath

Columns.Description: Type of asset that was scanned.
Columns.Name: AssetType

Columns.Description: Time at which the asset was created.
Columns.Name: AssetCreationTime

Columns.Description: Time at which the asset was last modified.
Columns.Name: AssetModifiedTime

Columns.Description: Owner of the asset.
Columns.Name: AssetOwner

Columns.Description: Time at which the asset was last scanned.
Columns.Name: AssetLastScanTime

Columns.Description: File extension of the asset scanned.
Columns.Name: FileExtension

Columns.Description: File size of the asset scanned.
Columns.Name: FileSize

Columns.Description: The type of data sensitivity event.
Columns.Name: ActivityType

Columns.Description: The trigger for the data sensitivity event.
Columns.Name: ActivityTrigger

Columns.Description: List of classifications found.
Columns.Name: Classification

Columns.Description: Total number of classifications found.
Columns.Name: ClassificationCount

Columns.Description: IDs for labels found.
Columns.Name: SensitivityLabelGuid

Columns.Description: Names for the labels found.
Columns.Name: SensitivityLabelName

Columns.Description: User who triggered the change.
Columns.Name: UserId

Columns.Description: The name of the table
Columns.Name: Type

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the resource that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _ResourceId

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the subscription that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _SubscriptionId
